## Description {#details}

Class which stores all the state required in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a>.

Since MachineIRBuilders will only store state in this object, it allows to transfer BuilderState between different kinds of MachineIRBuilders.

Definition at line 45 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/machineirbuilder-h">MachineIRBuilder.h</a>.
